DOC.brief_summary: Identify one flat bread mix produce reduction positive incremental area curve ( iAUC ) post-prandial glucose relative control product .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Selected Fibres Flours Flat Bread Post-prandial Blood Glucose Responses
DOC.detailed_description: This study double-blind , randomise , balance incomplete block design exploratory study efficacy , 11 active treatment compare control product 42 healthy subject see mix active ingredient ( viscous fibre flour ) lower post-prandial glucose ( PPG ) response capillary blood ( finger prick ) two three hour period , relative control product . Every subject receive control 4 11 treatment five separate test day .
DOC.criteria: Body mass index ( BMI ) ≥ 20 ≤ 25.0 kg/m2 . Apparently healthy : medical condition might affect study measurement ( judge study physician ) . A fasting blood glucose value 3.5 5.6 mmol/litre screening ( measure finger prick ) . Use medication interferes study measurement ( judge study physician ) . Reported dietary habit : medically prescribe diet , slimming diet , use eat 3 meal day , vegetarian . Reported weight loss/gain ( > 10 % ) last six month study
